net.javacoding.jspider.api.model
Interface DecisionStep

All Known Implementing Classes:
DecisionStepInternal
public interface DecisionStep

Interface to be implemented upon classes that will represent a DesisionStep, a step in the process of the decision taking on a resource URL whether it should be spidered and/or parsed. $Id: DecisionStep.java,v 1.2 2003/04/04 20:06:02 vanrogu Exp $

Author:
Günther Van Roey.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getComment()
          Returns any comment or explanation given by the rule about it's explanation
 int getDecision()
          The decision that was taken by the rule (DONTCARE, ACCEPT, IGNORE, FORBIDDEN)
 java.lang.String getRule()
          Returns the name of the rule that took this decision step
 int getRuleType()
          Determines whether it is a GENERAL rule or SITE local rule.
